description: A utility class for managing authentication tokens in a Flutter app using shared preferences.

classes.name: TokenStorage
classes.description: A static utility class that provides methods to save, retrieve, and delete an authentication token using shared preferences.

methods.name: saveToken
methods.description: Asynchronously saves the provided token string into shared preferences under a fixed key.

methods.name: getToken
methods.description: Asynchronously retrieves the stored token string from shared preferences, or null if none exists.

methods.name: deleteToken
methods.description: Asynchronously removes the stored token from shared preferences.
